wz:next.visible: !#empty(customerForm.name) and !#empty(customerForm.email) and customerForm.title != null and customerForm.site != null

wz:custom.visible: !#empty(customerForm.name) and !#empty(customerForm.email) and customerForm.title != null and customerForm.site != null
wz:custom.label: Done

wz:custom.visible: !#empty(ticketForm.subject) AND ticketForm.basesite != null AND ticketForm.customer != null AND !#empty(ticketForm.message)
wz:custom.label: customersupport.tickets.wizard.done

wz:custom.visible: !#empty(ticketForm.subject) AND ticketForm.basesite != null AND ticketForm.customer != null AND !#empty(ticketForm.message)
wz:custom.label: customersupport.tickets.wizard.done
